subject: Re: [junit] Unknown Source?
msgSnippet: ... Make sure the Java compiler is being invoked with debug enabled (-g). If you re using Ant, the javac task should include debug= true Let me know if this
messageBody:
Guerry Semones wrote:

>I've used Junit in past jobs, and do not recall seeing this issue. I am
>running Junit under JDK1.31 on Windows and a Unix platform. In either
>case, when I get a failure's stack trace, I get "unknown source" for my
>java code, rather than a line number where one would expect it.
>

Make sure the Java compiler is being invoked with debug enabled (-g).

If you're using Ant, the javac task should include

debug="true"


Let me know if this helps, and I'll add it to the FAQ.

Mike
